topic.title: BLOOD PRODUCTS REQUIRED FOLLOWING OESOPHAGECTOMY INDICATION CODE
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the PATIENT required any blood products following an Oesophagectomy (the surgical removal of all or part of the oesophagus) during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell and if so the whether the transfusion was intra-operative or post-operative.
